text: I love Tai Seng Christian Church☺️☺️💕
A homely church for everyone, no matter how young or younger you are! Events organised are catered to all ages. I love how friends and families can get together on the 5th Sundays Combined Service :)

apart from having one of the best children’s handbell choirs in the region, witness a handful of sisters whip up the most delectably authentic regional cuisine around... from Vietnamese Phở to Bak-Zam Gai to Bubur Cha Cha... & if u’re lucky n have been very good, u’ll be spirited away by pastor Anna Lee & sister Wan Yee’s baking... (no wonder Reverend Daniel can’t lose weight 😉)
soak in chatter of English, Mandarin & Cantonese every Sunday...
Mandarin Service 9.30am every Sunday with parallel Children’s Sunday School.
English Service 11.15am on 2nd to 4th Sundays
A friendly church that welcomes you! A place to know God more :) definitely recommend family and friends for the service and activities! Service timings are 930am on Sundays! See you there 😊
Friendly learn quite  alot  about  locations n transport to take n time to reach home from Tai Seng Christian Church
